name: The Essense of Mu
description:
What seems to be an average world, an old man has to watch two young children while keeping them entertained. A story about magic is the only thing the old man can think of. You find yourself watching and playing the story of the past which formed Lemuria into what it is today.

Notes:

This is the first time I’ve ever used RPG Maker MZ and to be honest I prefer Unity, but this intrigued me. It’s not very long at the moment, cutscenes/play/cutscenes that go directly back to the main menu. So in other words a demo. Most graphics and sounds come automatically with RPG Maker. There is a lot that is basic and hasn’t been changed besides a few extra bits here and there, I’m still a newb at using RPG Maker.

I plan on continuing the game eventually since I do have the full story written out. I just have to convert it some how to game form. But having a job and life, I can’t devote all my time to this. If this is something you like and want to see more of please leave a comment or donate a few $ to help. If it gets enough interest I can invest more time as well as getting better graphics/sounds for it.
